participant_1.background:
I need to move more, and get my beer gut under control.
i am a huge fan of jason mraz.
I had a client cancel her wedding a week before the big day.
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes feel like my pets are the only ones who truly understand me.
I recently enjoyed a wine tour with my friends.
I love being in nature, which helps me clear my mind and relax after a long day of gaming.
if things are not done right i will redo them again and again.
sometimes i feel like i have already been through life once before.

content.text: Hey, I'm new here! I'm not sure what to say...
Hi there! What are some of your interests?
I'm really into music, I like Jason Mraz, and I love gummy worms!
Oh yeah, gummy worms are the best! I'm more of a chocolate fan myself, but gummy worms are good too.
I recently went on a wine tour with my friends, it was so much fun!
That sounds like a great time! I love wine, I'm not sure if I've ever been on a wine tour before though.
It was really cool! We got to learn about all the different types of wine and how they're made.
That sounds really interesting, I would love to do something like that sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun and you can learn a lot about wine.
I definitely will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else are you interested in?
I love being in nature, it's so peaceful and relaxing.
Me too! I love going for walks in the park and hiking.
Me too! I love being in the mountains, especially.
Me too! I've always wanted to go to the Grand Canyon.
That would be amazing! I've always wanted to go there too.
Maybe we can go together sometime!
That would be so much fun
